dcterms:creator: T. Schultz
dcterms:description: GlobalPhone is a multilingual speech and text database developed at Karlsruhe University, designed to facilitate research in automatic speech recognition across multiple languages.
dcterms:title: GlobalPhone

dcterms:description: IARPA Babel is a collection of speech data designed for research in automatic speech recognition, particularly for low-resource languages.
dcterms:title: IARPA Babel

dcterms:creator: I. P. Association
I. P. A. Staff
dcterms:description: The International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) is a standardized representation of the sounds of spoken language, used for phonetic transcription.
dcterms:title: International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA)

dcterms:creator: D. Povey
A. Ghoshal
G. Boulianne
L. Burget
O. Glembek
N. Goel
M. Hannemann
P. Motlicek

P. Schwarz
dcterms:description: The Kaldi Toolkit is an open-source toolkit for speech recognition, providing a flexible and extensible framework for building speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Kaldi Toolkit
